ThunderCracker: Yes, I know exactly what you mean. I once was a terrorist, =
but it cost me my life. The Matrix saw fit to reincarnate me. I have to fol=
low what it says...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@aol.c=
om 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 20, 2001 4:11 PM
  =
Subject: Re: Large Post


  :::Ramjet/Vulois::: 

  Ramjet: yes, we have a =
base. It's in the place that will someday be called 
  Syria.  It once belo=
nged to another faction, and when we found it it was 
  ruined.  But we fix=
ed it up, and I'd be glad to show you it.  Would you like 
  to see? 
  ~~~=
~~ 
  ::Vulois nodded reluctantly:: 
  Vulois: Although i'd prefer we didn'=
t resort to violence, i know that you are 
  just trying to keep the peace =
yourselves, and will assist you in any way i 
  can. 
  ::He fired a blast =
of energy at the dragon:: 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
